column2:
valid_survey |>
  mutate(age_stated = case_when(q3_a == 1 ~ "18-24",
                                q3_b == 1 ~ "25-29",
                                q3_c == 1 ~ "30-39",
                                q3_d == 1 ~ "40+"),
         age_class = case_when(age_18_24 == 1 ~ "18-24",
                               age_25_29 == 1 ~ "25-29",
                               age_30_39 == 1 ~ "30-39",
                               age_40 == 1 ~ "40+")) |>
  xtabs(formula=~age_class + age_stated)
